post_text:
One year passed from that lesson I’ve learned.
If you love something try not to lose it fight for it the past is the past you can’t do anything for it and you don’t know what is coming but only what matters is the next second. You have to Choose between the red pill, and the blue pill .
You have to choose and be ready for the consequences .
It was your choice from the beginning.
name: مجاهد محمد
